Hi, I am Aniket.


I am a undergrad student at Pimpri Chinchwad College of Engineering in Computer Engineering, working on Edge and Parallel Computing in Agriculture and Healthcare projects.

I have experience in IoT Devices and Robotics, where I explored areas such as Computer Networks, Hardware Interfacing, Navigation, Inverse Kinematics and Path Planning of Robots.

Projects

Health(AI)ness

HealtAIness helps users to exercise and train for health and fitness using 3D Spatial Camera for pose estimation.

Health Management System using Edge Computing

Device to detect if person is wearing mask and having healthy heart rate using M5Stack Core2, ESP32CAM, AWS IoT and Edge Impulse

Mango Plant Disease Detection

It helps in classifying the diseases of mango leaves for our Mango Farm in India using Tensorflow and OpenVino in Drones
